#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define M 274877906944
#define m 274877906944
using namespace std;
 
ll X[1000005];
int main(){
    register unsigned ll t,a,d,n,x,i,sum,p;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>a>>d>>n>>x;
        sum=0;
        X[0]=1;
        for(i=1;i<=n+1;i++)
            X[i]=(X[i-1]*x)%m;
 
        for(i=0;i<=n;i++){
            sum = ((sum%M) + ((a+i*d)%M * X[n-i]%m )%M)%M;
           
        }
        
        cout<<sum%M<<endl;
    }
}
